kid_examples.name: Maya Chen
kid_examples.description: Maya is a studious character who excels at research and knowledge-based challenges. Her high Mind trait makes her excellent at puzzles and strategy.
tips: Use her Research talent to find hidden information
Her Ancient Tome provides knowledge bonuses
Pair with a supportive Animon to cover physical weaknesses

kid_examples.name: Jake Rodriguez
kid_examples.description: Jake is a physically capable character who excels in action and athletics. His high Body trait makes him great at physical challenges.
tips: Use his Parkour talent for movement advantages
His impatience can create interesting roleplay moments

animon_examples.name: Sparkwing
animon_examples.description: Sparkwing is a fast, electric-type flying Animon that excels at hit-and-run tactics.
tips: High Agility makes it very fast and hard to hit
Electric element is strong against Water and Aerial types
Lightning Dive combines speed with electric damage

animon_examples.name: Rockshield
animon_examples.description: Rockshield is a defensive Earth-type Animon that specializes in protection and endurance.
tips: High Heart gives excellent HP and survivability
Earth element resists many attack types
